title: Spinach Egg Omelette
ingredients: spinach:250g,eggs:4,salt:1 tsp,pepper:1 tsp
steps: Beat the eggs with salt and pepper|Blench spinach then squeeze dry and cool|Mix egg and spinach|Heat a pan and add oil and mixture - low heat|Roll on pan

title: Rice Cooker Mushroom Chicken Rice
ingredients: rice:1 cup,chicken thigh:600g,shiitake mushroom:5,salt:1 tsp,light soy sauce:1 tbsp,dark soy sauce:1 tbsp,corn starch:2 tsp,sesame oil:1 tsp,white pepper:1 tsp,ginger:1 s
steps: Cut chicken into bite size pieces and season with sauces|Slice mushrooms|Oil bowl then add rice, water, chicken, mushrooms to rice cooker and cook|Add sesame oil 2 min before serve

title: Red Braised Pork Belly
ingredients: skin-on pork belly:700 g,ginger:4 s,star anise:2,cinnamon stick:1,bay leaf:2,dried chilli: 1,light soy sauce:2 tbsp,dark soy sauce:2 tbsp,lump sugar:30 g,chinese cooking wine:3 tbsp
steps: Wash pork belly and dry and dice in big cubes|Heat pork in pot without oil in low heat|Add lump sugar|Add spices then wine then hot water|Simmer for at least 40 min|Uncover and increase heat to reduce sauce until thickened

title: Lettue with Oyster Sauce
ingredients: romaine lettuce:2,oyster sauce:2 tbsp,light soy sauce:1 tbsp,sugar:1 tsp,garlic:3 cloves
steps: Cut lettuce into big pieces and wash|Blench lettuce in boiling water with salt and oil then drain|Mix sauces|Fry garlic and heat sauce|Pour sauce on top of lettuce

title: Salmon Zosui
ingredients: asparagus:100 g,salmon fillet:250 g,cooked rice:1 bowl,cabbage:200 g,mushroom:100 g,black fungus:100 g,salt:1 tsp,sugar:1 tsp,white pepper:1 tsp,green onion:1,sesame seeds:1 tbsp,light soy sauce: 1 tbsp
steps: Cut all vegatables into small slices|Minimal oil to fry salmon, tear skin, cool|Fry mushroom, then all veg, add soy sauce and water and salt and sugar|Add salmon belly|Add sesame and rice|Add rest of salmon|Crush salmon skin into flakes and add with sesame and green onion

title: Pasta alla Norma
ingredients: pasta:400 g,eggplant:2,courgette:1,onion:1,tomato passata:700 g,garlic:2 cloves,mixed herbs:1 tsp,salt:1 tsp,pepper:1 tsp,white wine:1 tbsp,red pepper flakes:1 tsp,parmesan cheese:4 tsp
steps: Cut eggplant and courgette into cubes and salt and pepper|Roast 240 oC or fry until brown and drain|Cook pasta al dente|Fry onion, garlic, then add wine, tomato passata, herbs, pepper flakes, salt and pepper and simmer|Stir in veg then pasta|Serve with parmesan and pepper

title: Fried Vermicelli
ingredients: vermicelli:400 g,egg:2,carrot:1,cabbage:200 g,mince:250g,salt:1 tsp,pepper:1 tsp,soy sauce:1 tbsp,oyster sauce:0.5 tbsp,chinese cooking wine:1 tbsp
steps: Soak vermicelli in warm water until soft then drain|Beat eggs|Cut veg into thin strips|Heat oil then scramble eggs then set aside|Fry mince, season|Add carrot then other veg, then vermicelli, egg, season with sauces, stir fry

title: Mapo Tofu
ingredients: silken tofu:400 g,mince:250 g,garlic:3 cloves,ginger:1 s,chilli bean paste:1 tbsp,salt:1 tsp,white pepper:1 tsp,light soy sauce:1 tbsp,chinese cooking wine:1 tbsp,corn starch:2 tsp,green onion:1,sichuan peppercorn:15,dried red chilli:2,paprika:2 tsp
steps: Cut tofu into cubes and boil in salted water then drain|Season mince with garlic and ginger and salt and soy sauce|Mix sauce|Heat oil then fry peppercorn then remove|Add mince mixture and chilli bean paste and dried chilli and wine|Add tofu and sauce mixture and gently mix, simmer|Garnish with paprika and green onion

title: Stir-Fried Shredded Beef with Green Peppers
ingredients: beef slices:300 g,green pepper:2,garlic:2 cloves,red chilli:1,salt:1 tsp,sugar:1 tsp,white pepper:1 tsp,light soy sauce:1 tbsp,dark soy sauce:1 tbsp,chinese cooking wine:1 tbsp,corn starch:2 tsp,oyster sauce:1 tbsp,sesame oil:2 tsp
steps: Cut chilli into thin strips|Cut beef into slices and marinate with wine, salt, pepper, sugar, soy sauces, sesame oil, corn starch, water, then little egg and corn starch (rest of egg can be used to fry rice)|Fry beef half-way|Fry garlic then add oyster sauce and chilli to stir fry|Add water, soy sauce, salt then corn starch and beef until sauce thickens|Add sesame oil and green onion

title: Sliced Beef in Hot and Sour Soup
ingredients: beef slices:300 g,enoki mushroom:150 g,tomato:3,green pepper:1,red chilli:2,salt:1 tsp,white pepper:1 tsp,light soy sauce:1 tbsp,green onion:1,ginger:2 s,garlic:2 cloves,chinese cooking wine:1 tbsp,oyster sauce:0.5 tbsp,sesame seeds:1 tbsp
steps: Cut all ingredients|Blench enoki mushroom and drain|Blench sliced beef in boiling water with ginger and cooking wine|Heat oil then fry ginger and garlic|Add tomato then water to boil|Add salt, soy sauce, oyster sauce, wine|Add enoki mushroom and beef slices until fully cooked|Assemble dish with chilli, sesame, green onion toppings|Heat oil and pour

title: Kung Pao Chicken
ingredients: chicken breast:500 g,peanut:100 g,cucumber:1,carrot:1,chilli bean paste:1 tbsp,garlic:3 cloves,dried red chilli:4,sichuan peppercorn:6,red chilli:2,salt:1 tsp,sugar:1 tsp,light soy sauce:2 tsp,egg:1,chinese cooking wine:1 tbsp,corn starch:2 tsp,oyster sauce:2 tsp,sesame oil:2 tsp,vinegar:1 tsp,honey:1 tsp,green onion:1
steps: Cut chicken into bite size pieces and marinate with salt, wine, soy sauce, egg white, corn starch, sesame oil|Cut vegs into chunks|Mix sauce (vinegar, sugar, osyter sauce, wine, honey, green onion, water, sesame oil, corn starch)|Heat oil then peanuts|Same oil to fry peppercorn and dried chilli, remove|Same oil to fry chicken and set aside|Add chilli bean paste, garlic, then veg, then chicken|Add sauce mixture and stir fry|Add peanuts

title: Teppanyaki Noodle with Black Pepper Mushroom Sauce
ingredients: pasta:400 g,mushroom:200 g,onion:1,garlic:2 cloves,butter:1 tbsp,black pepper:2 tsp,salt:1 tsp,soy sauce:1 tbsp,corn starch:2 tsp,ketchup:2 tsp,egg:1,mixed herb:1 tsp
steps: Dice all veg|Cook pasta al denta|Heat butter then fry garlic and onion|Fry one-sided egg and set aside|Fry onion, mushrooms, garlic and season with salt, pepper and add ketchup and butter|Add water, soy sauce, sugar, mixed herb and black pepper|Add corn starch mixture to thicken|Assemble in hot pan

title: Prawns and Vermicelli Pot
ingredients: king prawns:150 g,vermicelli:300 g,garlic:4 cloves,salt:1 tsp,sugar:1 tsp,white pepper:1 tsp,light soy sauce:1 tbsp,oyster sauce:2 tsp,chinese leaf:1,green onion:1,red chilli:1
steps: Soak vermicelli in warm water until soft then drain|Season prawns with salt and pepper|Cut chinese leaf into chuncks|Heat oil to pour onto garlic and red chilli|Add soy sauce, salt, sugar, oyster sauce to mixture|Boil water and add chinese leaf and vermicelli until cooked|Add prawns|Add sauce mixture and simmer|Garnish with green onion

title: Braised Beef Brisket with Tomato and Potatoes
ingredients: beef brisket:600 g,tomato:3,potato:2,carrot:1,onion:1,ginger:2 s,garlic:2 cloves,star anise:2,cinnamon stick:1,bay leaf:2,dried chilli:1,salt:1 tsp,light soy sauce:1 tbsp,dark soy sauce:1 tbsp,chinese cooking wine:1 tbsp,lump sugar:5 g,green onion:1
steps: Blench beef from cold water and wine and ginger|Cut veg into chunks|Heat oil then fry onion, ginger, garlic, then add veg, beef and hot water to cover|Add sauces and spices, simmer for 1 h|High heat to thicken|Garnish with green onion

title: Kimchi Fried Rice
ingredients: cooked rice:1 bowl,kimchi:400 g,egg:2,mince:250 g,green onion:1,salt:1 tsp,white pepper:1 tsp,sugar:2 tsp,soy sauce:1 tbsp,oyster sauce:1 tbsp,sesame oil:2 tsp,egg:1,sesame seed:1 tbsp
steps: Cut kimchi into small pieces|Fry mince|Add kimchi, then soy sauce, set aside|Beat eggs then scramble eggs, fry with rice|Add sauces and green onion|Garnish with sesame and green onion and sesame oil

title: Pad Kaphrao
ingredients: mince:250 g,basil:1 bunch,garlic:2 cloves,red chilli:2,salt:1 tsp,pepper:1 tsp,light soy sauce:1 tbsp,fish sauce:2 tsp,sugar:1 tsp,egg:2
steps: Separate egg yolk from white and fry one-sided egg, set aside|Fry mince, garlic, add sauces, red chili and basil, stir fry|Assemble

title: Red Lentil Dahl
ingredients: red lentil:400 g,onion:1,carrot:1,canned tomato:1,garlic:2 cloves,ginger:1 s,curry powder:1 tsp,cumin:1 tsp,coriander powder:1 tsp,turmeric powder:1 tsp,paprika:1 tsp,salt:1 tsp,coconut milk:400 ml,garam masala:1 tsp,coriander:1 bunch,lime:1
steps: Cut veg into small pieces|Heat oil then fry onion, garlic, ginger|Add curry powder, cumin, paprika, tumeric, ground coriander and toast|Add broth or water, canned tomato, coconut milk, and dried red lentils, then season with salt and pepper, and simmer for 30 min|Add garam masala|Garnish with coriander and lime juice

title: Stir-Fried Aubergine and Beans
ingredients: green bean:200 g,aubergine:1,garlic:2 cloves,red chilli:1,light soy source:1 tbsp,dark soy source:0.5 tbsp,osyter sauce:1 tbsp, sugar:2 tsp,corn starch:2 tsp
steps: Cut veg|Season aubergine with salt and squeeze water out|Fry aubergine and set aside|Fry beans and set aside|Fry garlic and red chilli and add all veg with all sauce

title: Ge Da Soup
ingredients: tomato:4,egg:4,plain flour:300 g,spring onion:1,salt:2 tsp,sugar:1 tsp,light soy sauce:1 tbsp,vinegar:1 tbsp,sesame oil:2 tsp,white pepper:2 tsp
steps: Cut tomato and beat eggs|Add water to flour little by little while stirring until small doughs are formed|Fry tomato and add sugar and white pepper, then add water to boil|Add doughs, then eggs, then season|Add spring onion and sesame oil

title: Scallion Chicken Thighs
ingredients: chicken thigh:4,salt:1 tsp,pepper:1 tsp,corn flour:2 tsp,leek:1,light soy sauce:1 tbsp,oyster sauce:2 tsp,sugar:1 tsp,chinese cooking wine:2 tsp
steps: Debone chicken thigh, cut, and marinate with wine, salt, pepper, then corn flour|Fry chicken to golden|Add leek and sauces and stir fry

title: Broccoli In Oyster Sauce
ingredients: broccoli stem:400 g,garlic:3 cloves,light soy sauce:1 tbsp,oyster sauce:2 tbsp,salt:1 tsp
steps: Blench broccoli in boiling water with salt and oil|Fry garlic and add sauces and water|Add broccoli to stir fry

title: Beef and Potato Dry Pot
ingredients: beef:250 g,potato:2,onion:1,garlic:2 cloves,red chilli:1,sichuan peppercorn:6,dried red chilli:2,ginger:1 s,hot pot base:1,light soy sauce:1 tbsp,dark soy sauce:1 tbsp,white pepper:1 tsp,oyster sauce:2 tsp,sesame seed:1 tbsp,cumin:1 tbsp,paprika:1 tbsp
steps: Marinate beef strips with sauces|Cut veg|Heat beaf and set aside|Fry or bake potato strips until golden|Fry garlic, ginger, peppercorn, dried chilli and hot pot base|Add beef and potato, then add light soy sauce and cumin|Stir fry onion and add sesame seeds

title: Curry Beef Brisket
ingredients: beef brisket:750 g,ginger:3 s,spring onion: 1,bay leaf:1,sichuan peppercorn:5,star anise:1,potato:2,carrot:2,milk:100 g,onion:1,curry cube:3
steps: Blench beef brisket from cold water|Add beef, onions and spices to water to boil|Turn to small heat to stew for 1 h|Fry onion and carrot and set aside|Sear beef then add carrot and onion to stir fry|Add hot water and stew for 5 min|Add potato and stew for 30 min|Add curry cube and milk

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: beef mince:300 g,onion:1,garlic:2 cloves,mixed herb:2 tsp,red wine:2 tbsp,tomato puree:2 tsp,canned tomato:1,pasta:400 g,salt:1 tsp,pepper:1 tsp,parmesan cheese:4 tsp
steps: Cook pasta al denta|Saute onion and garlic|Brown beef|Add wine and tomato and all sauces|Mix and serve with parmesan and pepper

title: Tomato Scrambled Eggs with Shrimps
ingredients: king prawns:150 g,tomato:4,egg:3,salt:1 tsp,white pepper:1 tsp, ketchup:1 tbsp,corn starch:2 tsp,sugar:1 tsp
steps: Season prawns with salt, pepper and corn starch|Beat eggs and cut tomato|Fry tomato, add sugar, and add eggs to scramble|Add cooked prawns and season

title: Carbonara
ingredients: pasta:400 g,onion:1,parmesan cheese:75 g,pancetta:100 g,egg:3,garlic:2 cloves,butter:50 g,salt:1 tsp,pepper:1 tsp,white wine:2 tbsp
steps: Cook pasta al denta|Saute onion and garlic|Fry pancetta and drop butter|Add wine|Mix eggs with cheese and salt and pepper|Mix everything on pan off the heat and serve with parmesan and pepper

title: Kimchi Pork Belly Stir-Fry
ingredients: kimchi:200 g,pork belly:500 g,spring onion:2,onion:1,garlic:2 cloves,sugar:1 tsp,honey:1 tsp,light soy sauce:2 tsp
steps: Fry pork belly|Add spring onion and onion|Add kimchi and season|Add spring onion and quick stir fry

title: Yuxiang Shredded Pork
ingredients: pork loin:250 g,carrot:1,green pepper:1,wood-ear fungus:50 g,spring onion:2,garlic:2 cloves,giner:1 s,salt:1 tsp,pepper:1 tsp,chinese cooking wine:1 tbsp,egg:1,corn starch:1 tbsp,sugar:2 tsp,vinegar:2 tsp,light soy sauce:2 tsp,chilli bean paste:1 tbsp
steps: Cut all veg|Marinate pork with salt, pepper, wine, egg, and corn starch|Mix sugar, vinegar, wine, salt, soy sauce, corn starch and water|Fry pork until white and set aside|Fry carrot and add chilli bean paste, then add spring onion, garlic, and ginger|Add all veg, then pork, then sauce, stir fry

title: Spicy Stir-Fry Yellow Beef
ingredients: beef tenderloin:250 g,coriander:100 g,red chilli:2,pickled pepper:2,garlic:4 cloves,light soy sauce:2 tsp,oyster sauce:1 tbsp,white pepper:1 tsp,corn starch:1 tsp,sesame oil:1 tsp,ginger:2 s
steps: Marinate beef with oil, sauces, pepper, corn starch, and sesame oil|Fry ginger, chilli and garlic, then add beef|Add coriander and quick stir fry

title: Chinese Sausage Claypot Rice
ingredients: rice:1 cup,chinese sausage:2,light soy sauce:1 tbsp,dark soy sauce:1 tsp,oyster sauce:1 tsp,egg:1,shitake mushroom:1,vegetable of choice:100 g
steps: Soak rice|Cut all veg|Mix sauces|Fry vegs and add sausages and mushroom, then add sauce|Mix in rice cooker and cook|Add egg 5 min before ready and spring onion before serving

title: Stir-Fried Beef with Courgette
ingredients: courgette:400 g,beef tenderloin:200 g,garlic:1 clove,light soy sauce:2 tsp,oyster sauce:2 tsp,salt:1 tsp,corn starch:1 tsp
steps: Marinate beef|Fry beef and set aside|Fry garlic and add courgette slices, then add beef|Add oyster sauce and soy sauce and stir fry

title: Pak Choi with Oyster Sauce
ingredients: pak choi:2,oyster sauce:2 tbsp,light soy sauce:1 tbsp,sugar:1 tsp,garlic:3 cloves
steps: Mix sauces|Fry garlic and add pak choi, add water while stir frying|Add sauce and quick stir fry

title: Scrambled Egg with Prawns
ingredients: egg:4,prawn:200g,spring onion:1,chinese cooking wine:2 tsp,corn starch:2 tsp,salt:1 tsp,pepper:1 tsp
steps: Marinate prawns with salt and pepper and wine|Fry prawns quickly and set aside|Beat eggs and add prawns and corn starch|Heat pan and cut off heat and pour mixture|Add spring onion to serve

title: Beef Chow Fun
ingredients: ho fun:300 g,beef tenderloin:200 g,bean sprout:50 g,spring onion:2,egg:1,light soy sauce:1 tbsp,dark soy sauce:1 tbsp,corn starch:1 tsp,sugar:2 tsp,salt:1 tsp
steps: Slice beef and marinate with sauces, sugar, egg, and corn starch|Fry beef quickly and set aside|Fry egg and set aside|Fry ho fun and set aside|Fry bean sprout and green onion|Add ho fun and beef, then sauces, sugar and salt|Stir fry and add green onion

title: Stir-Fried Minced Pork with Garlic Scape
ingredients: garlic scape:500 g,mince:250 g,red chilli:3,spring onion:2,garlic:1 clove,ginger:1 s,light soy sauce:2 tsp,dark soy sauce:1 tsp,oyster sauce:1 tsp,sugar:1 tsp,corn starch:1 tsp
steps: Dice garlic scape|Mix all sauces|Fry spring onion, garlic and ginger, then add mince|Add sauce and garlic scape|Add red chilli and quick stir fry

title: Stir-Fried Sliced Pork Belly with Onions and Potatoes
ingredients: potato:2,pork belly:300 g,dried chilli:3,onion:1,green pepper:1,garlic:3 cloves,light soy sauce:2 tsp,dark soy sauce:1 tsp,salt:1 tsp
steps: Cut all veg and pork|Fry pork and set aside|Fry potato and add veg, then add pork|Add sauces and stir fry

title: Satay Beef Stew with Enoki Mushroom and Vermicelli
ingredients: beef slices:300 g,enoki mushroom:150 g,vermicelli:300 g,onion:1,butter:15 g,satay sauce:2 tbsp,shacha sauce:1 tbsp,light soy sauce:1 tsp,garlic:2 cloves
steps: Soak vermicelli in warm water until soft then drain|Mix sauces|Fry onion and garlic, then add butter|Add enoki mushroom, then sauces, then beef slices|Add boiling water and vermicelli|Season with soy sauce

title: Sausage Chow Mein
ingredients: sausage:4,pak choi:2,carrot:1,spring onion:2,garlic:2 cloves,egg noodle:400 g,light soy sauce:1 tbsp,dark soy sauce:1 tsp,oyster sauce:1 tsp
steps: Heat noodle in boiling water for 1 min, set in cool water|Fry spring onion and garlic, then add carrot and sausages, then add pak choi|Add noodle, then sauces, stir fry

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: chicken thigh:4,curry cube:100 g,milk:80 g,potato:2,carrot:1,onion:1,chinese cooking wine:1 tsp,light soy sauce:2 tsp,spring onion:2,ginger:1 s,salt:1 tsp,corn starch:1 tsp
steps: Marinate chicken cubes with wine, light soy sauce, spring onion, ginger, and corn starch|Cube all veg|Fry onions|Add chicken, then carrots, then water|Turn to low heat when boiled, add curry cubes and potato, simmer for 30 min|Season, add milk, turn to high heat to thicken
